"},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/history","text":"V 0.3.0 - 2022-03-27 * Update to TW version v5.2.2 * remove tiddler info button from view template * change license to CC-BY-NC-SA V 0.2.0 - 2021-03-07 * make plugin compatible with TW V5.1.23 * make plugin compatible with field-search plugin V0.3.0 V 0.1.2 - 2020-12-25 * update license V 0.1.1 - 2020.01.19 * Update license link/text V 0.1.0 - beta 2019.01.06 * fix wikify problems with TW 5.1.19 V 0.0.2 - beta * initial release ** name: advanced-search-plus "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/icon","text":""},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/license":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/license","license-text":"https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/legalcode","text":"[[Advanced Search Plus|https://wikilabs.github.io/#advanced-search-plus]] (c) Mario Pietsch - 2016-2022 [[Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike|https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/]]"},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/readme","text":"* Adds the "Advanced Search" tab also to the right sidebar * Replaces the default search option with an icon * Adds a "+" button to the advanced search function ** Allows to pin existing search settings to a new tab ---- ''Important'': This plugin modifies several core templates
    <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus]plugintiddlers[]prefix[$:/core/]] $:/AdvancedSearch $:/tags/AdvancedSearch">
